channel.title: Virgin Music Group on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Virgin Music Group on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mom + Pop Records Signs With Virgin Music Group For Distribution
item.description: Partnering with the team at Virgin is positively the right fit for us — they’ve been the most flexible and respectful of our ethos and independence," Mom + Pop founder Michael Goldstone said.
